Alucard's Boots.description:
Luxurious dark leather, lined with silk and gleaming threads of gold. An attire worthy of a legendary figure.

This is a cosmetic armor set and grants no attributes

Alucard's Cloak.description:
Luxurious dark leather, lined with silk and gleaming threads of gold. An attire worthy of a legendary figure.

This is a cosmetic armor set and grants no attributes

Alucard's Coat.description:
Luxurious dark leather, lined with silk and gleaming threads of gold. An attire worthy of a legendary figure.

This is a cosmetic armor set and grants no attributes

Alucard's Gloves.description:
Luxurious dark leather, lined with silk and gleaming threads of gold. An attire worthy of a legendary figure.

This is a cosmetic armor set and grants no attributes

Alucard's Leggings.description:
Luxurious dark leather, lined with silk and gleaming threads of gold. An attire worthy of a legendary figure.

This is a cosmetic armor set and grants no attributes

Amulet of the Arch-Warlock.description: %10 chance on primary hit to gain Frozen Weapon. Can only trigger once every 10s.

Amulet of the Blademaster.description: %10 chance on primary hit to gain Lesser Storm Shield. Can only trigger once every 10s.

Amulet of the Crimson Commander.description: %10 chance on primary hit to gain Lesser Blood Rage. Can only trigger once every 10s.

Amulet of the Master Spellweaver.description: %10 chance on primary hit to gain Lesser Phantom Aegis. Can only trigger once every 10s.

Amulet of the Unyielding Charger.description: %10 chance on primary hit to spawn a Skeleton Warrior. Can only trigger once every 10s.

Amulet of the Wicked Prophet.description: %10 chance on primary hit to gain Lesser Power Surge. Can only trigger once every 10s.

Banshee.description: Unit that yields Grave Dust, chance for Scourgestone and Spectral Dust.

Barrel Disguise.description:
Disguise yourself as a barrel, significantly reduces aggro range but reduces movement speed. You can perform a barrel roll stunning any enemy that you roll into. Rolling into a solid object stuns you instead. Taking any damage breaks the effect.

Produced at a Woodworking Bench.

Bat Leather.description:
Tanned bat hides used to craft armour, bags and various leather items.

Produced at a Advanced Tannery.

Bat Leather Bag.description: A bag increases the amount of items you may carry.

Blood Bone Ring.description: Magic Sources increase gear level and boost the power of spells.

Blood Corpse Pile.description: Unit that yields a vast amount of Alchemy resources.

Blood Elemental.description: Unit that yields at least 3 Regular Gems and a vast amount of Minerals.

Blood Essence.description: An energy source distilled from Blood. Vampires use it to control material, to unlock sealed knowledge and to convert humans into obedient servants.

Blood Golem.description: Unit that yields at least 3 Flawless Gems and a vast amount of Minerals.

Blood Harpy.description: Unit that yields at least 2 Study Books as well as a great amount of Paper and Scrolls.

Blood Hunter Boots.description: Elegant black leather attire, complemented with pieces of metal armour.

Blood Hunter Chestguard.description: Elegant black leather attire, complemented with pieces of metal armour.

Blood Hunter Gloves.description: Elegant black leather attire, complemented with pieces of metal armour.

Blood Hunter Leggings.description: Elegant black leather attire, complemented with pieces of metal armour.

Blood Key.description:
A mystical amulet providing the bearer entry into Dracula's Castle.

Produced at an Artisan Table.

Blood Merlot Amulet.description: Magic Sources increase gear level and boost the power of spells.

Blood Potion.description: Tap a prisoner on blood at the cost of %30 - %60 health. Increases misery by %10 - %20.

Blood Rose Brew.description: A brew that recovers %40 of your maximum health over 10s. The healing effect is limited when in combat and breaks upon taking damage.

Blood Rose Potion.description: A potion that recovers %55 of your maximum health over 10s. The healing effect is limited when in combat and breaks upon taking damage.

Blood Rose Seed.description: Sow this seed in a Growing Plot to make it grow.

Blood Treant.description: Unit that yields 4 - 8 Seeds of various types as well as a few Saplings.

Blood Witch.description: Unit that yields at least 2 Athenaeum Books as well as a great amount of Scrolls and Schematics.

Bone Axes.description: Dual-wield axes that deal physical damage. Has a greater effect on wood.

Bone Castle Key\nLevel 1.description:
By accessing a Level 3 Enemy Castle Heart you may spend Level 3 Castle Keys to trigger different actions.

Disable Defences
Spend 1 Key to disable enemy walls, doors, waygates and coffins.
Available on standard PvP Settings

Destroy Castle
Spend 1 Key to permanently destroy the castle.
Available on merciless PvP Settings

Claim Castle
Spend 3 Keys to seize control of the castle.
Available on merciless PvP Settings

Bone Crossbow.description: A ranged weapon that fires long range bolts.

Bone Mace.description: A heavy weapon that deals physical damage. Has a greater effect on minerals & rocks.

Bone Reaper.description: A two-handed weapon that deals physical damage. Has a greater effect on undead.

Bone Ring.description: Magic Sources increase gear level and boost the power of spells.

Bone Slashers.description: Dual-wield blades that deal physical damage. Has a greater effect on vegetation and thickets.

Bone Spear.description: A spear with a long-ranged attack that deals physical damage. Has a greater effect on creatures.

Bone Sword.description: An all-round weapon that deals physical damage. Has a greater effect on vegetation and thickets.

Boneguard Boots.description: Armour made from collecting the bones of the dead, grafting it together with sinew and hide.

Boneguard Chestguard.description: Armour made from collecting the bones of the dead, grafting it together with sinew and hide.

Boneguard Gloves.description: Armour made from collecting the bones of the dead, grafting it together with sinew and hide.

Boneguard Leggings.description: Armour made from collecting the bones of the dead, grafting it together with sinew and hide.

Brew of Ferocity.description:
A brew that increases physical power by 6 for 60 minutes.

Effect persist through death.

Carpet Roll.description: Artisan component used to craft castle decorations.

Charged Battery.description: A battery charged with lightning, useful for crafting advanced technology and items.

Chemical Soaked Cloak.description: A cloak grants the wearer protection against the elements.

Chemical Soaked Drape.description: A cloak grants the wearer protection against the elements.

Chemical Soaked Regalia.description: A cloak grants the wearer protection against the elements.

Clay Mold.description:
A mold of malleable clay used to construct decorative vases.

Produced at a Grinder.

Cloth.description:
Tailoring components are used for crafting clothes, armour and cloaks.

Produced at a Loom.

Coarse Thread.description:
A sturdy thread spun from plant fibre. Basic material used when tailoring various items.

Produced at a Loom.

Cotton.description: Harvested from Cotton Farms. Used for weaving cloth.

Copper Axes.description: Dual-wield axes that deal physical damage. Has a greater effect on wood.

Copper Castle Key\nLevel 2.description:
By accessing a Level 3 Enemy Castle Heart you may spend Level 3 Castle Keys to trigger different actions.

Disable Defences
Spend 1 Key to disable enemy walls, doors, waygates and coffins.
Available on standard PvP Settings

Destroy Castle
Spend 1 Key to permanently destroy the castle.
Available on merciless PvP Settings

Claim Castle
Spend 3 Keys to seize control of the castle.
Available on merciless PvP Settings

Copper Coin.description: A plain copper coin. Nowdays only used by the shady dealers of Farbane. Its sides are adorned with the face of the former archbishop of Brighthaven.

Copper Crossbow.description: A ranged weapon that fires long range bolts.

Dread Plate Boots.description: Fearsome plate armor, handcrafted to inspire fear and awe into your enemies.

Dread Plate Chestguard.description: Fearsome plate armor, handcrafted to inspire fear and awe into your enemies.

Dread Plate Gloves.description: Fearsome plate armor, handcrafted to inspire fear and awe into your enemies.

Dread Plate Leggings.description: Fearsome plate armor, handcrafted to inspire fear and awe into your enemies.

Dusk Caller.description:
Summon a swarm of bats to transport a subdued human back to the nearest unoccupied prison cell within your realm.

Produced at an Alchemy Lab.

Duskwatcher Boots.description: Studded leather armor, tactically designed to allow greater dexterity in combat.

Duskwatcher Chestguard.description: Studded leather armor, tactically designed to allow greater dexterity in combat.

Duskwatcher Gloves.description: Studded leather armor, tactically designed to allow greater dexterity in combat.

Duskwatcher Leggings.description: Studded leather armor, tactically designed to allow greater dexterity in combat.

EMP.description: A device that triggers an electro magnetic pulse when struck. Can be used to temporarily disable electrical sources.

Empty Glass Bottle.description: An empty glass bottle, useful for creating potions.

Empty waterskin.description: An empty waterskin, useful for creating potions.

Enchanted Brew.description:
A brew that increases spell power by 3 for 60 minutes.

Effect persist through death.

Fire Blossom Seed.description: Sow this seed in a Growing Plot to make it grow.

Fire Resistance Brew.description:
A brew that increases fire resistance rating by 50 for 60 minutes.

Effect persist through death.

Fish Bone.description: Reagent used to craft alchemical potions. Tends to attract vermin.

Fishing Pole.description:
Use it to catch fish! Keep an eye out for bubbling water in lakes and streams.

Crafted from Inventory or at a Woodworking Bench.

Flawless Amethyst.description: Gemstone used to craft powerful magical objects and weapons.

Flawless Emerald.description: Gemstone used to craft powerful magical objects and weapons.

Flawless Miststone.description: Gemstone used to craft powerful magical objects and weapons.

Flawless Ruby.description: Gemstone used to craft powerful magical objects and weapons.

Flawless Sapphire.description: Gemstone used to craft powerful magical objects and weapons.

Flawless Topaz.description: Gemstone used to craft powerful magical objects and weapons.

Garlic Resistance Potion.description:
A potion that increases garlic resistance rating by 80 for 60 minutes.

Effect persist through death.

Gem Dust.description: Pulverized gemstones, used to craft magical objects.

Ghost Shroom.description: Reagent used to craft alchemical potions and magical objects.

Ghost Shroom Spores.description: Sow this seed in a Growing Plot to make it grow.

Ghost Yarn.description:
A spectral fabric used to craft powerful armour.

Produced at a Advanced Loom.

Ghoul.description: Unit that yields Bones, chance for Grave Dust.

Giant Rat.description: Unit that yields Rugged Hides, chance for low grade Seeds

Glass.description:
Material useful in both crafting and construction.

Produced at a Furnace.

Gold Ingot.description:
Valuable metal component used to craft powerful weapons & magical objects.

Produced at a Advanced Furnace.

Golden Castle Key\nLevel 4/5.description:
By accessing a Level 3 Enemy Castle Heart you may spend Level 3 Castle Keys to trigger different actions.

Disable Defences
Spend 1 Key to disable enemy walls, doors, waygates and coffins.
Available on standard PvP Settings

Destroy Castle
Spend 1 Key to permanently destroy the castle.
Available on merciless PvP Settings

Claim Castle
Spend 3 Keys to seize control of the castle.
Available on merciless PvP Settings

Goldsun Coin.description: A coin made of silver and gold from the Church of Luminance, used in trade and to pay church taxes in the city of Brighthaven. Its gold inlay portrays the sun.

Grave Dust.description:
A fine powder made from the bones of the dead. Used to craft magical objects and consumable items.

Produced at a Grinder.

Gravedigger Ring.description: Magic Sources increase gear level and boost the power of spells.

Greater Blood Essence.description:
An energy source distilled from Blood. Vampires use it to control material, to unlock sealed knowledge and to convert humans into obedient servants.

Produced at a Blood Press.

Greater Stygian Shard.description: Shards aglow with energy hailing from the enigmatic shadow realm.

Grim Knight Boots.description: Sturdy plate armor, favoring brute efficiency over intricate design.

Grim Knight Chestguard.description: Sturdy plate armor, favoring brute efficiency over intricate design.

Grim Knight Gloves.description: Sturdy plate armor, favoring brute efficiency over intricate design.

Grim Knight Leggings.description: Sturdy plate armor, favoring brute efficiency over intricate design.

A potion that increases holy resistance rating by 75 for 60 minutes.

Midnight Ball Gown.description:
This shimmering gown exudes an air of ethereal enchantment, befitting the most elegant vampires gracing the ballroom.

This is a cosmetic armor set and grants no attributes

Midnight Nobleman Pants.description:
This exquisite ensemble exudes an aura of aristocratic elegance, tailored with the finest velvet.

This is a cosmetic armor set and grants no attributes

Midnight Nobleman Suit.description:
This exquisite ensemble exudes an aura of aristocratic elegance, tailored with the finest velvet.

This is a cosmetic armor set and grants no attributes

A brew that increases garlic resistance rating by 40 for 60 minutes.

Effect persist through death.

Mosquito.description: Unit that yields Pristine Hide, spawns with a random blood type.

Mountain Peak Bag.description: A bag increases the amount of items you may carry.

Mourning Lily Seed.description: Sow this seed in a Growing Plot to make it grow.

A dense dark mineral.

Refined at a Gem Cutting Table.

Oil.description: A greasy oil used for tanning.

Onyx Tear.description:
A black material forged by blood, gold and power. Used to restore the most powerful of weapons.

Produced at an Anvil.

Pendant of the Dawnrunner.description: %10 chance on primary hit to inflict Condemn. Can only trigger once every 4s.

Pendant of the Duskwatcher.description: %10 chance on primary hit to inflict Static. Can only trigger once every 4s.

Pendant of the Warlock.description: %10 chance on primary hit to inflict Chill. Can only trigger once every 4s.

Plague Brier Seeds.description: Sow this seed in a Growing Plot to make it grow.

Plague Chemist\u2019s Saddle.description:
A fine saddle that increases mount speed by 1 and acceleration by 1. Can be equipped on a Vampire Horse.

Alters the visuals of your Vampire Horse.

Plated Boneguard Chestguard.description: Armour made from collecting the bones of the dead, grafting it together with sinew and hide.

Plated Boneguard Gloves.description: Armour made from collecting the bones of the dead, grafting it together with sinew and hide.

Plated Boneguard Leggings.description: Armour made from collecting the bones of the dead, grafting it together with sinew and hide.

Pollen.description:
A powdery substance useful for dyeing and strengthening threads & fabrics.

Refined at a Grinder.

Potion of Rage.description:
A brew that increases physical power by 6 for 60 minutes.

Effect persist through death.

Power Core.description: An object that holds an immense amount of energy.

Primal Blood Essence.description:
An energy source distilled from Blood. Vampires use it to control material, to unlock sealed knowledge and to convert humans into obedient servants.

Produced at a Advanced Blood Press.

Pristine Leather.description:
Tanned hide used to craft armour, cloaks and various leather items.

Produced at a Tannery.

Pristine Leather Bag.description: A bag increases the amount of items you may carry.

Radium Alloy.description:
A radiant material emitting powerful energy.

Refined at a Furnace.

Rat.description: Can be consumed to gain a small amount of blood, alters your blood type to frailed.

Razer Serpent Cloak.description: A cloak grants the wearer protection against the elements.

Razer Serpent Mantle.description: A cloak grants the wearer protection against the elements.

Razer Serpent Wrap.description: A cloak grants the wearer protection against the elements.

Regular Amethyst.description:
Gemstone used to craft magical objects and weapons.

Can be upgraded to a higher quality at a Gem Cutting Table.

Regular Emerald.description:
Gemstone used to craft magical objects and weapons.

Can be upgraded to a higher quality at a Gem Cutting Table.

Regular Miststone.description:
Gemstone used to craft magical objects and weapons.

Can be upgraded to a higher quality at a Gem Cutting Table.

Gemstone used to craft magical objects and weapons.

Can be upgraded to a higher quality at a Gem Cutting Table.

Regular Sapphire.description:
Gemstone used to craft magical objects and weapons.

Can be upgraded to a higher quality at a Gem Cutting Table.

Regular Topaz.description:
Gemstone used to craft magical objects and weapons.

Can be upgraded to a higher quality at a Gem Cutting Table.

Reinforced Bone Axes.description: Dual-wield axes that deal physical damage. Has a greater effect on wood.

Reinforced Bone Crossbow.description: A ranged weapon that fires long range bolts.

Reinforced Bone Mace.description: A heavy weapon that deals physical damage. Has a greater effect on minerals & rocks.

Reinforced Bone Reaper.description: A two-handed weapon that deals physical damage. Has a greater effect on undead.

Reinforced Bone Slashers.description: Dual-wield blades that deal physical damage. Has a greater effect on vegetation and thickets.

Reinforced Bone Spear.description: A spear with a long-ranged attack that deals physical damage. Has a greater effect on creatures.

Reinforced Bone Sword.description: An all-round weapon that deals physical damage. Has a greater effect on vegetation and thickets.

Reinforced Plank.description:
Woodworking component used to craft weapons and castle structures.

Produced at a Sawmill.

Ring of the Dawnrunner.description: Magic Sources increase gear level and boost the power of spells.

Ring of the Duskwatcher.description: Magic Sources increase gear level and boost the power of spells.

Ring of the Spellweaver.description: Magic Sources increase gear level and boost the power of spells.

Ring of the Warlock.description: Magic Sources increase gear level and boost the power of spells.

Rowdain's Steed.description:
A fine saddle that increases mount speed by 1 and acceleration by 1. Can be equipped on a Vampire Horse.

Alters the visuals of your Vampire Horse.

Sanguine Axes.description: Dual-wield axes that deal physical damage. Has a greater effect on wood.

Sanguine Crossbow.description: A ranged weapon that fires long range bolts.

Sanguine Greatsword.description: A great heavy sword that deals physical damage. Has a greater effect on wood.

Sanguine Longbow.description: A ranged weapon that fires arrows.

Sanguine Mace.description: A heavy weapon that deals physical damage. Has a greater effect on minerals & rocks.

Sanguine Pistols.description: Black-powder weapons effective at medium range.

Sanguine Reaper.description: A two-handed weapon that deals physical damage. Has a greater effect on undead.

Sanguine Slashers.description: Dual-wield blades that deal physical damage. Has a greater effect on vegetation and thickets.

Sanguine Spear.description: A spear with a long-ranged attack that deals physical damage. Has a greater effect on creatures.

Sanguine Sword.description: An all-round weapon that deals physical damage. Has a greater effect on vegetation and thickets.

Sanguine Whip.description: A weapon with a piercing attack that deals additional physical damage in an area at mid-range.

Schematic.description:
Used to uncover new technology at a Athenaeum.

Produced at a Paper Press.

Scourgestone.description:
Magical component used for crafting magical objects and consumable items.

Produced at a Furnace.

Scourgestone Pendant.description: Magic Sources increase gear level and boost the power of spells.

Scroll.description:
Used to uncover new technology at a Study.

Produced at a Paper Press.

Sculptured Wood.description: Artisan component used to craft castle decorations.

Shadewalker Boots.description: Flexible cloth and leather, ideal for nimble fighting.

Shadewalker Gloves.description: Flexible cloth and leather, ideal for nimble fighting.

Shadewalker Leggings.description: Flexible cloth and leather, ideal for nimble fighting.

Shadewalker Vest.description: Flexible cloth and leather, ideal for nimble fighting.

Shadow Axes.description: Dual-wield axes that deal physical damage. Has a greater effect on wood.

Shadow Crossbow.description: A ranged weapon that fires long range bolts.

Shadow Greatsword.description: A great heavy sword that deals physical damage. Has a greater effect on wood.

Shadow Longbow.description: A ranged weapon that fires arrows.

Shadow Mace.description: A heavy weapon that deals physical damage. Has a greater effect on minerals & rocks.

Shadow Reaper.description: A two-handed weapon that deals physical damage. Has a greater effect on undead.

Shadow Slashers.description: Dual-wield blades that deal physical damage. Has a greater effect on vegetation and thickets.

Shadow Spear.description: A spear with a long-ranged attack that deals physical damage. Has a greater effect on creatures.

Shadow Sword.description: An all-round weapon that deals physical damage. Has a greater effect on vegetation and thickets.

Shadow Weave.description:
A black fabric used to craft the most powerful armour.

Produced at a Advanced Loom.

Shadow Whip.description: A weapon with a piercing attack that deals additional physical damage in an area at mid-range.

Shadowmoon Boots.description: Armour of dark leather garments and crimson silk with pieces of gleaming metal and gold.

Shadowmoon Chestguard.description: Armour of dark leather garments and crimson silk with pieces of gleaming metal and gold.

Shadowmoon Gloves.description: Armour of dark leather garments and crimson silk with pieces of gleaming metal and gold.

Shadowmoon Leggings.description: Armour of dark leather garments and crimson silk with pieces of gleaming metal and gold.

Shroud of the Forest.description:
Makes the wearer immune to the Curse of the Forest.

Crafted from Inventory or at a Tailoring Bench.

Siege Golem Stone.description:
Place the Siege Stone in an uncontested location. It takes 150s for the stone to activate. When activated you can interact with it to transform into a Siege Golem for up to 300s allowing you to break into stone structures. You can absorb a set amount of damage before the form breaks, the amount of damage you can absorb scales based on the health of the Siege Stone.

Depending on server settings the placement of a Siege Stone may be announced to other players and may be visible for everyone on the map.

Silk.description:
Tailoring components are used for crafting clothes, armour and cloaks.

Produced at a Loom.

Silver Coin.description: The common coin in Dunley Farmlands, made of silver to ward off vampires. Fittingly, it’s stamped with the visage of Solarus the Immaculate.

Silver Ingot.description:
Metal component used to craft weapons and armour.

Produced at a Furnace.

Silver Resistance Brew.description:
A brew that increases silver resistance rating by 15 for 60 minutes.

Effect persist through death.

Silver Resistance Potion.description:
A potion that increases silver resistance rating by 50 for 60 minutes.

Effect persist through death.

Silver Thread Bag.description: A bag increases the amount of items you may carry.

Skeleton Priest.description: Unit that yields Bones, chance for Scourgestone and Grave Dust.

Sludge-filled Canister.description: A canister filled with toxic sludge. Not recommended to drink.

Snow Flower Seed.description: Sow this seed in a Growing Plot to make it grow.

Soul Shard of Dracula.description:
%20 chance on primary hit to inflict Vampiric Curse. Can only trigger once every 8s.

Replaces your Ultimate Ability with Blood Storm.

Soul Shards lose durability over time and can only be repaired by feeding on Primal Blood Souls during Rift Incursions.

PvP Settings - Unique Soul Shards
When this setting is enabled, only one Soul Shard of each type may exist and Soul Shards are permanently destroyed if not repaired.

Soul Shard of Solarus.description:
%10 chance on primary hit to spawn a Death Knight. Can only trigger once every 10s.

Replaces your Ultimate Ability with Fallen Angel.

Soul Shards lose durability over time and can only be repaired by feeding on Primal Blood Souls during Rift Incursions.

PvP Settings - Unique Soul Shards
When this setting is enabled, only one Soul Shard of each type may exist and Soul Shards are permanently destroyed if not repaired.

Soul Shard of the Monster.description:
%20 chance on primary hit to trigger Chain Lightning.

Replaces your Ultimate Ability with Eye of the Storm.

Soul Shards lose durability over time and can only be repaired by feeding on Primal Blood Souls during Rift Incursions.

PvP Settings - Unique Soul Shards
When this setting is enabled, only one Soul Shard of each type may exist and Soul Shards are permanently destroyed if not repaired.

Soul Shard of the Winged Horror.description:
%20 chance on primary hit to trigger a Chaos Explosion igniting all nearby enemies.

Replaces your Ultimate Ability with Voidquake Vortex.

Soul Shards lose durability over time and can only be repaired by feeding on Primal Blood Souls during Rift Incursions.

PvP Settings - Unique Soul Shards
When this setting is enabled, only one Soul Shard of each type may exist and Soul Shards are permanently destroyed if not repaired.

Spectral Dust.description:
A powder sparkling with ethereal energy. Used to craft magical objects and consumable items.

Produced at a Advanced Grinder.

Stone Body.description:
A large block of stone used to construct decorative castle features.

Produced at a Grinder.

Stone Dust.description:
Residue from processing stone.

Refined at a Smelter.

Sulphur.description:
A highly combustible material used to craft explosives.

Produced at a Furnace.

Sunflower Seed.description: Sow this seed in a Growing Plot to make it grow.

Thick Leather.description:
Tanned hide used to craft armour, cloaks and various leather items.

Produced at a Tannery.

Traveller's Wrap.description: A cloak grants the wearer protection against the elements.

Vampire Horse Saddle.description: A fine saddle that increases mount speed by 1 and acceleration by 1. Can be equipped on a Vampire Horse.

Vampiric Brew.description:
A brew that increases Spell Leech by %10 and Blood Type Efficiency by %5 for 60 minutes.

Effect persist through death.

Vampiric Dust.description:
A powder sparkling with vampiric energy. Used to craft powerful vampiric artifacts.

Produced at a Advanced Grinder.

Vermin Salve.description: A salve that recovers %35 of your maximum health over 15s. The healing effect is limited when in combat and breaks upon taking damage.

Warlock Boots.description: Elegant robes inscribed with runes of power.

Warlock Gloves.description: Elegant robes inscribed with runes of power.

Warlock Leggings.description: Elegant robes inscribed with runes of power.

Warlock Vest.description: Elegant robes inscribed with runes of power.

Whetstone.description:
A stone used to sharpen weapons and tools.

Produced at a Furnace.

Witch Potion.description:
A brew that increases spell power by 3 for 60 minutes.

Effect persist through death.

Wool Thread.description:
Tailoring components are used for crafting clothes, armour and cloaks.

Produced at a Loom.

Wrangler\u2019s Potion.description:
A potion that increases your movement speed when mounted by %15 for 60 minutes.

Effect persist through death.
